mapper.select: SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, t.NAME teacherName, TEACHER_NUM teacherNum, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.NAME) teacherNameShow, to_char(t.BIRTHDAY,'yyyy-mm-dd') birthday, to_char(t.FIRS_ENDTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') firsEndtime, to_char(t.FINALE_ENDTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') finaleEndtime, MAJOR major, t.FINAL_EDUCATION finalEducation, t.DEGEE degee, MAJOR_GRADE majorGrade, MAJOR_NAME majorName, MAJOR_DEPT majorDept, MAJOR_FIELD majorField, MAJOR_SPECIALTY majorSpecialty, to_char(MAJOR_DATE,'yyyy-mm') majorDate, CAREER_GRADE careerGrade, CAREER_NAME careerName, CAREER_DEPT careerDept, to_char(CAREER_GETTIME,'yyyy-mm') careerGettime, EXPERT_DEPT expertDept, EXPERT_WORK expertWork, to_char(EXPERT_DATE,'yyyy-mm') expertDate, TRAINING_NAME trainingName, TRAINING_PLACE trainingPlace, TRAINING_DAY trainingDay, t.NATIVEPLACE nativePlace, SIGNING signing, to_char(WORK_DATE,'yyyy-mm') workDate, POLITICS_MAJORCODE politicsMajorCode, POLITICS_MAJORNAME politicsMajorName, SEND_DEPT sendDept, t.NATION nation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.NATION, 'MZ') nationShow, t.TEACHER_SEX teacherSex, t.POLITICALSTATUS politicalStatus, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.POLITICALSTATUS, 'ZZMM') politicalStatusShow, t.FIRSTEDUCATION firstEducation, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONSTATUS firstEducationStatus, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONSCHOOL firstEducationSchool, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONMAJOR firstEducationMajor, t.FINALEDUCATIONSCHOOL finalEducationSchool, t.LICENCE licence, to_char(t.GETTIME,'yyyy-mm') getTime, XZ_POSITION xzPosition, SFZY_TEACHER sfzyTeacher, SFSS_TEACHER sfssTeacher, SFMS_TEACHER sfmsTeacher, SFGG_TEACHER sfggTeacher, SRPOSITION srPosition, QIYE_YEAR qiyeYear, QIYE_DAY qiyeDate, t.DEPARTMENT_ID departmentId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(DEPARTMENT_ID,'T_SYS_DEPT','DEPT_ID','DEPT_NAME') departmentIdShow, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(MAJOR, 'T_XG_MAJOR', 'MAJOR_CODE', 'MAJOR_NAME') majorShow, t.TITLE title, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TITLE, 'ZCJB') titleShow, t.TEACHER_CATEGORY teacherCategory, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TEACHER_CATEGORY, 'JSLB') teacherCategoryShow, work_dept workDept FROM T_JW_TEACHER_CONDITION t WHERE t.NAME = #{teacherName}

SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, t.NAME teacherName, TEACHER_NUM teacherNum, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.NAME) teacherNameShow, to_char(t.BIRTHDAY,'yyyy-mm-dd') birthday, to_char(t.FIRS_ENDTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') firsEndtime, to_char(t.FINALE_ENDTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') finaleEndtime, MAJOR major, t.FINAL_EDUCATION finalEducation, t.DEGEE degee, MAJOR_GRADE majorGrade, MAJOR_NAME majorName, MAJOR_DEPT majorDept, MAJOR_FIELD majorField, MAJOR_SPECIALTY majorSpecialty, to_char(MAJOR_DATE,'yyyy-mm') majorDate, CAREER_GRADE careerGrade, CAREER_NAME careerName, CAREER_DEPT careerDept, to_char(CAREER_GETTIME,'yyyy-mm') careerGettime, EXPERT_DEPT expertDept, EXPERT_WORK expertWork, to_char(EXPERT_DATE,'yyyy-mm') expertDate, TRAINING_NAME trainingName, TRAINING_PLACE trainingPlace, TRAINING_DAY trainingDay, t.NATIVEPLACE nativePlace, SIGNING signing, to_char(WORK_DATE,'yyyy-mm') workDate, POLITICS_MAJORCODE politicsMajorCode, POLITICS_MAJORNAME politicsMajorName, SEND_DEPT sendDept, t.NATION nation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.NATION, 'MZ') nationShow, t.TEACHER_SEX teacherSex, t.POLITICALSTATUS politicalStatus, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.POLITICALSTATUS, 'ZZMM') politicalStatusShow, t.FIRSTEDUCATION firstEducation, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONSTATUS firstEducationStatus, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONSCHOOL firstEducationSchool, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONMAJOR firstEducationMajor, t.FINALEDUCATIONSCHOOL finalEducationSchool, t.LICENCE licence, to_char(t.GETTIME,'yyyy-mm') getTime, XZ_POSITION xzPosition, SFZY_TEACHER sfzyTeacher, SFSS_TEACHER sfssTeacher, SFMS_TEACHER sfmsTeacher, SFGG_TEACHER sfggTeacher, SRPOSITION srPosition, QIYE_YEAR qiyeYear, QIYE_DAY qiyeDate, t.DEPARTMENT_ID departmentId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(DEPARTMENT_ID,'T_SYS_DEPT','DEPT_ID','DEPT_NAME') departmentIdShow, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(MAJOR, 'T_XG_MAJOR', 'MAJOR_CODE', 'MAJOR_NAME') majorShow, t.TITLE title, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TITLE, 'ZCJB') titleShow, t.TEACHER_CATEGORY teacherCategory, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TEACHER_CATEGORY, 'JSLB') teacherCategoryShow, work_dept workDept FROM T_JW_TEACHER_CONDITION t WHERE t.TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.update: update T_JW_TEACHER_CONDITION SET NAME=#{teacherName}, DEPARTMENT_ID=#{departmentId}, BIRTHDAY=to_date(#{birthday},'yyyy-mm-dd'), FINAL_EDUCATION=#{finalEducation}, DEGEE=#{degee}, MAJOR=#{major}, TITLE=#{title}, TEACHER_CATEGORY=#{teacherCategory}, NATIVEPLACE=#{nativePlace}, NATION=#{nation}, POLITICALSTATUS=#{politicalStatus}, GETTIME=to_date('${getTime}','yyyy-mm'), FIRSTEDUCATION=#{firstEducation}, FIRSTEDUCATIONSTATUS=#{firstEducationStatus}, FIRSTEDUCATIONSCHOOL=#{firstEducationSchool}, FIRSTEDUCATIONMAJOR=#{firstEducationMajor}, LICENCE=#{licence}, FINALEDUCATIONSCHOOL=#{finalEducationSchool}, TEACHER_NUM=#{teacherNum}, XZ_POSITION=#{xzPosition}, FIRS_ENDTIME=to_date(#{firsEndtime},'yyyy-mm-dd'), FINALE_ENDTIME=to_date(#{finaleEndtime},'yyyy-mm-dd'), MAJOR_FIELD=#{majorField}, MAJOR_SPECIALTY=#{majorSpecialty}, WORK_YEAR=#{workYear}, MAJOR_YEAR=#{majorYear}, MAJOR_GRADE=#{majorGrade}, MAJOR_NAME=#{majorName}, MAJOR_DEPT=#{majorDept}, MAJOR_DATE=to_date(#{majorDate},'yyyy-mm'), CAREER_GETTIME=to_date(#{careerGettime},'yyyy-mm'), CAREER_GRADE=#{careerGrade}, CAREER_NAME=#{careerName}, CAREER_DEPT=#{careerDept}, SFZY_TEACHER=#{sfzyTeacher}, SFSS_TEACHER=#{sfssTeacher}, SFMS_TEACHER=#{sfmsTeacher}, SFGG_TEACHER=#{sfggTeacher}, POLITICS_MAJORCODE=#{politicsMajorCode}, POLITICS_MAJORNAME=#{politicsMajorName}, TEACHER_SEX=#{teacherSex}, QIYE_YEAR=#{qiyeYear}, QIYE_DAY=#{qiyeDate}, EXPERT_DEPT=#{expertDept}, EXPERT_WORK=#{expertWork}, EXPERT_DATE=to_date(#{expertDate},'yyyy-mm'), TRAINING_NAME=#{trainingName}, TRAINING_DAY=#{trainingDay}, TRAINING_PLACE=#{trainingPlace}, WORK_DATE=to_date(#{workDate},'yyyy-mm'), SRPOSITION=#{srPosition}, SIGNING=#{signing}, SEND_DEPT=#{sendDept}, CHANGER=#{changer}, CHANGE_TIME=sysdate, CHANGE_DEPT=#{changeDept}, WORK_DEPT=#{workDept} WHERE TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.TEACHER_ID as "value", t.NAME as "label" FROM T_JW_TEACHER_CONDITION t

SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, t.TEACHER_NAME teacherName, DEPARTMENT_ID departmentId, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.TEACHER_NAME) teacherNameShow, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(T.DEPARTMENT_ID) departmentIdShow, t.TEACHING_LEVEL teachingLevel, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TEACHING_LEVEL, 'JSJLJB') teachingLevelShow, t.SUBJECT subject, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.SUBJECT, 'T_JW_COURSE', 'COURSE_ID', 'COURSE_NAME') subjectShow, to_char(t.ISSUING_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') issuingTime, t.ISSUING_DEPT issuingDept, t.VALIDITY_TERM validityTerm FROM T_JW_DOUBLE_DIVISION_TEACHER t WHERE t.TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.update: update T_JW_DOUBLE_DIVISION_TEACHER SET TEACHER_NAME=#{teacherName}, TEACHING_LEVEL=#{teachingLevel}, DEPARTMENT_ID=#{departmentId}, SUBJECT=#{subject}, ISSUING_TIME=to_date(#{issuingTime},'yyyy-mm-dd'), ISSUING_DEPT=#{issuingDept}, VALIDITY_TERM=#{validityTerm}, CHANGER=#{changer}, CHANGE_TIME=sysdate, CHANGE_DEPT=#{changeDept} WHERE TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, t.TEACHER_NAME personId, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.TEACHER_NAME) teacherName, t.TRAINING_LEVEL trainingLevel, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TRAINING_LEVEL, 'PXJB') trainingLevelShow, t.TRAINING_CONTENT trainingContent, t.TRAINING_DATE trainingDate, t.TRAINING_DAY trainingDay, t.TRAINING_PLACE trainingPlace, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TRAINING_CONCLUSION, 'PXJL') trainingConclusion, t.CREATOR creator, t.CREATE_TIME createTime FROM T_JW_TRAINING t WHERE 1 = 1
AND FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.TEACHER_NAME) LIKE '%${teacherName}%'
AND t.TRAINING_LEVEL= #{trainingLevel}
AND t.TRAINING_CONTENT like '%'||#{trainingContent}||'%'
ORDER BY t.CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.insert: insert into T_JW_TRAINING (TEACHER_ID,TEACHER_NAME,TRAINING_LEVEL,TRAINING_CONTENT,TRAINING_DATE,TRAINING_DAY,TRAINING_PLACE, TRAINING_CONCLUSION, CREATOR,CREATE_TIME,CREATE_DEPT) values (FUNC_GET_UUID,#{teacherName},#{trainingLevel},#{trainingContent},#{trainingDate},#{trainingDay},#{trainingPlace}, #{trainingConclusion}, #{creator},sysdate,#{createDept})
mapper.select: SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, t.TEACHER_NAME teacherName, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.TEACHER_NAME) teacherNameShow, t.TRAINING_LEVEL trainingLevel, t.TRAINING_CONTENT trainingContent, t.TRAINING_DATE trainingDate, t.TRAINING_DAY trainingDay, t.TRAINING_PLACE trainingPlace, t.TRAINING_CONCLUSION trainingConclusion FROM T_JW_TRAINING t WHERE t.TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.update: update T_JW_TRAINING SET TEACHER_NAME=#{teacherName}, TRAINING_LEVEL=#{trainingLevel}, TRAINING_CONTENT=#{trainingContent}, TRAINING_DATE=#{trainingDate}, TRAINING_DAY=#{trainingDay}, TRAINING_PLACE=#{trainingPlace}, TRAINING_CONCLUSION=#{trainingConclusion}, CHANGER=#{changer}, CHANGE_TIME=sysdate, CHANGE_DEPT=#{changeDept} WHERE TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, t.TEACHER_NAME teacherName, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.TEACHER_NAME) teacherNameShow, t.HONOR_NAME honorName, t.GET_TIME getTime, t.HONOR_LEVEL honorLevel, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.HONOR_LEVEL, 'RYJB') honorLevelShow FROM T_JW_GETHONOR t WHERE t.TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.update: update T_JW_GETHONOR SET TEACHER_NAME=#{teacherName}, HONOR_NAME=#{honorName}, GET_TIME=#{getTime}, HONOR_LEVEL=#{honorLevel}, CHANGER=#{changer}, CHANGE_TIME=sysdate, CHANGE_DEPT=#{changeDept} WHERE TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, t.TEACHER_NAME teacherName, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.TEACHER_NAME) teacherNameShow, t.EDUCATION education, t.degee degee, t.FINISH_SCHOOL, t.major majorShow, t.GET_TIME FROM T_JW_EDUCATION_IMPROVE t WHERE t.TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.update: update T_JW_EDUCATION_IMPROVE SET TEACHER_NAME=#{teacherName}, EDUCATION=#{education}, DEGEE=#{degee}, FINISH_SCHOOL=#{finishSchool}, MAJOR=#{major}, GET_TIME=#{getTime}, CHANGER=#{changer}, CHANGE_TIME=sysdate, CHANGE_DEPT=#{changeDept} WHERE TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, t.TEACHER_NAME personId, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.TEACHER_NAME) teacherName, t.ASSESSMENT_CONTENT, t.ASSESSMENT_TIME, t.ASSESSMENT_RESULT, t.CREATOR creator, t.CREATE_TIME createTime FROM T_JW_BUSINESS_ASSESSMENT t WHERE 1 = 1
AND FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.TEACHER_NAME) LIKE '%${teacherName}%'
AND t.ASSESSMENT_CONTENT like '%'||#{assessmentContent}||'%'
ORDER BY t.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, t.TEACHER_NAME teacherName, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.TEACHER_NAME) teacherNameShow, t.ASSESSMENT_CONTENT, t.ASSESSMENT_TIME, t.ASSESSMENT_RESULT FROM T_JW_BUSINESS_ASSESSMENT t WHERE t.TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.update: update T_JW_BUSINESS_ASSESSMENT SET TEACHER_NAME=#{teacherName}, ASSESSMENT_CONTENT=#{assessmentContent}, ASSESSMENT_TIME=#{assessmentTime}, ASSESSMENT_RESULT=#{assessmentResult}, CHANGER=#{changer}, CHANGE_TIME=sysdate, CHANGE_DEPT=#{changeDept} WHERE TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.COMPETITION_ID competitionId, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(competition_level, 'JSJB') competitionLevel, t.COMPETITION_GROUP competitionGroup, t.COMPETITION_PROJECT competitionProject, t.HOST_UNIT hostUnit, t.create_time, t.score score FROM T_JW_COMPETITION t
where t.COMPETITION_PROJECT like '%'||#{competitionProject}||'%'

SELECT t.COMPETITION_ID competitionId, t.COMPETITION_LEVEL competitionLevel, t.COMPETITION_PROJECT competitionProject, t.COMPETITION_GROUP competitionGroup, t.HOST_UNIT hostUnit, t.score score FROM T_JW_COMPETITION t WHERE COMPETITION_ID = #{competitionId}
mapper.insert: insert into T_JW_COMPETITION (COMPETITION_ID, COMPETITION_GROUP, COMPETITION_LEVEL, COMPETITION_PROJECT, SCORE, HOST_UNIT, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_DEPT) values (FUNC_GET_UUID, #{competitionGroup}, #{competitionLevel}, #{competitionProject}, #{score}, #{hostUnit}, #{creator}, sysdate, #{createDept})
mapper.update: update T_JW_COMPETITION SET COMPETITION_GROUP=#{competitionGroup}, COMPETITION_LEVEL=#{competitionLevel}, COMPETITION_PROJECT=#{competitionProject}, SCORE=#{score}, HOST_UNIT=#{hostUnit}, CHANGER=#{changer}, CHANGE_TIME=sysdate, CHANGE_DEPT=#{changeDept} WHERE COMPETITION_ID = #{competitionId}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.REWARD_ID rewardId, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.REWARD_NAME, 'JLCF') rewardName, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.REWARD_LEVEL, 'JSJB') rewardLevel, t.COGNIZANCE_UNIT cognizanceUnit, t.COGNIZANCE_PROCESS cognizanceProcess, t.COGNIZANCE_CONCLUSION cognizanceConclusion, to_char(t.COGNIZANCE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') cognizanceDate, t.TERM_VALIDITY termValidity FROM T_JW_REWARDANDPUNISHMENT t
where t.REWARD_NAME = #{rewardName}

SELECT t.REWARD_ID rewardId, t.REWARD_NAME rewardName, t.REWARD_LEVEL rewardLevel, t.COGNIZANCE_UNIT cognizanceUnit, t.COGNIZANCE_PROCESS cognizanceProcess, t.COGNIZANCE_CONCLUSION cognizanceConclusion, to_char(t.COGNIZANCE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') cognizanceDate, t.TERM_VALIDITY termValidity FROM T_JW_REWARDANDPUNISHMENT t where t.REWARD_ID= #{rewardId}
mapper.insert: insert into T_JW_REWARDANDPUNISHMENT (REWARD_ID,REWARD_NAME, REWARD_LEVEL, COGNIZANCE_UNIT,COGNIZANCE_PROCESS,COGNIZANCE_CONCLUSION,COGNIZANCE_DATE,TERM_VALIDITY, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_DEPT) values (FUNC_GET_UUID, #{rewardName}, #{rewardLevel}, #{cognizanceUnit}, #{cognizanceProcess}, #{cognizanceConclusion},to_date('${cognizanceDate}','yyyy-mm-dd'),#{termValidity}, #{creator}, sysdate, #{createDept})
mapper.update: update T_JW_REWARDANDPUNISHMENT SET REWARD_NAME=#{rewardName}, REWARD_LEVEL=#{rewardLevel}, COGNIZANCE_UNIT=#{cognizanceUnit}, COGNIZANCE_PROCESS=#{cognizanceProcess}, COGNIZANCE_CONCLUSION=#{cognizanceConclusion}, COGNIZANCE_DATE=to_date('${cognizanceDate}','yyyy-mm-dd'), TERM_VALIDITY=#{termValidity}, CHANGER=#{changer}, CHANGE_TIME=sysdate, CHANGE_DEPT=#{changeDept} WHERE REWARD_ID = #{rewardId}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(T.DEPARTMENT_ID) departmentId, XZ_POSITION xzPosition, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.NAME) teacherName, TEACHER_NUM teacherNum, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TEACHER_SEX, 'XB') teacherSex, to_char(t.BIRTHDAY,'yyyy-mm-dd') birthday, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.NATION, 'MZ') nationShow, t.NATIVEPLACE nativePlace, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.POLITICALSTATUS, 'ZZMM') politicalStatusShow, t.FIRSTEDUCATION firstEducation, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONSTATUS firstEducationStatus, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONSCHOOL firstEducationSchool, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONMAJOR firstEducationMajor, to_char(t.FIRS_ENDTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') firsEndtime, t.FINAL_EDUCATION finalEducation, t.DEGEE degee, t.MAJOR major, to_char(t.FINALE_ENDTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') finaleEndtime, FINALEDUCATIONSCHOOL finalEducationSchool, MAJOR_FIELD majorField, MAJOR_SPECIALTY majorSpecialty, LICENCE licence, to_char(t.GETTIME,'yyyy-mm') getTime, QIYE_YEAR qiyeYear, QIYE_DAY qiyeDate, MAJOR_GRADE majorGrade, MAJOR_NAME majorName, MAJOR_DEPT majorDept, to_char(t.MAJOR_DATE,'yyyy-mm') majorDate, t.TITLE title, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TITLE, 'ZCJB') titleShow, CAREER_GRADE careerGrade, CAREER_NAME careerName, CAREER_DEPT careerDept, to_char(t.CAREER_GETTIME,'yyyy-mm') careerGettime, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.SFZY_TEACHER, 'SF') sfzyTeacher, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.SFSS_TEACHER, 'SF') sfssTeacher, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.SFGG_TEACHER, 'SF') sfggTeacher, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.SFMS_TEACHER, 'SF') sfmsTeacher, POLITICS_MAJORCODE politicsMajorCode, POLITICS_MAJORNAME politicsMajorName, to_char(t.WORK_DATE,'yyyy-mm') workDate, SIGNING signing, EXPERT_DEPT expertDept, EXPERT_WORK expertWork, to_char(t.EXPERT_DATE,'yyyy-mm') expertDate, TRAINING_NAME trainingName, TRAINING_DAY trainingDay, TRAINING_PLACE trainingPlace, SEND_DEPT sendDept, SRPOSITION srPosition
FROM T_JW_TEACHER_CONDITION t WHERE 1 = 1 and t.TEACHER_CATEGORY=#{teacherType} ORDER BY t.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT t.TEACHER_ID teacherId, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(T.DEPARTMENT_ID) departmentId, XZ_POSITION xzPosition, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.NAME) teacherName, TEACHER_NUM teacherNum, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TEACHER_SEX, 'XB') teacherSex, to_char(t.BIRTHDAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') birthday, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.NATION, 'MZ') nationShow, t.NATIVEPLACE nativePlace, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.POLITICALSTATUS, 'ZZMM') politicalStatusShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.FIRSTEDUCATION, 'XL') firstEducation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.FIRSTEDUCATIONSTATUS, 'XW') firstEducationStatus, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONSCHOOL firstEducationSchool, t.FIRSTEDUCATIONMAJOR firstEducationMajor, to_char(t.FIRS_ENDTIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') firsEndtime, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.FINAL_EDUCATION, 'XL') finalEducation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.DEGEE, 'XW') degee, t.MAJOR major, to_char(t.FINALE_ENDTIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') finaleEndtime, FINALEDUCATIONSCHOOL finalEducationSchool, MAJOR_FIELD majorField, MAJOR_SPECIALTY majorSpecialty, LICENCE licence, to_char(t.GETTIME, 'yyyy-mm') getTime, QIYE_YEAR qiyeYear, QIYE_DAY qiyeDate, MAJOR_GRADE majorGrade, MAJOR_NAME majorName, MAJOR_DEPT majorDept, to_char(t.MAJOR_DATE, 'yyyy-mm') majorDate, t.TITLE title, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TITLE, 'ZCJB') titleShow, CAREER_GRADE careerGrade, CAREER_NAME careerName, CAREER_DEPT careerDept, to_char(t.CAREER_GETTIME, 'yyyy-mm') careerGettime, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.SFZY_TEACHER, 'SF') sfzyTeacher, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.SFSS_TEACHER, 'SF') sfssTeacher, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.SFGG_TEACHER, 'SF') sfggTeacher, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.SFMS_TEACHER, 'SF') sfmsTeacher, POLITICS_MAJORCODE politicsMajorCode, POLITICS_MAJORNAME politicsMajorName, to_char(t.WORK_DATE, 'yyyy-mm') workDate, SIGNING signing, EXPERT_DEPT expertDept, EXPERT_WORK expertWork, to_char(t.EXPERT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm') expertDate, TRAINING_NAME trainingName, TRAINING_DAY trainingDay, TRAINING_PLACE trainingPlace, SEND_DEPT sendDept, SRPOSITION srPosition FROM T_JW_TEACHER_CONDITION t WHERE 1 = 1 and t.TEACHER_CATEGORY=#{teacherType} ORDER BY t.CREATE_TIME DESC
